author: Staff Reporter
text:
A large number of students took part in a marathon organised by the district administration in a bid to create awareness of achieving total sanitation.

The marathon, commenced from the Collectorate premises, was flagged off by Collector M. Ravikumar. Apart from Thoothukudi, a similar programme was organised in all panchayats across the district.

While boys ran up to a 10-km distance, girls ran up to a stretch of five km, the Collector said.

At the valedictory function, 48 students, who won the marathon, were given medals and certificates of appreciation at the District Sports Stadium here.

M. Pradeep, Assistant Collector (Training), V. Pitchai, Project Director, District Rural Development Agency, and L. Theerthose, District Sports Officer, were present.
title: Awareness marathon held in Tuticorin
